text: Hello! I use HubSpot CTAs in some of my wordpress sites, they have worked always pretty well, but today I realized they all stopped working, in different sites. Any idea what can be going on?
Hey Mariana, by not working are you talking about events or rendering? Can you DM me some of the sites?
Is there a way to specifically target the deal owner email as a property? Right now we only get the deal owner ID
Hi everyone! Is there a way to partition lists? I want to assign access to a list to a specific team that will also hide this list from others.

Hi all, I'm having an issue where I need to display a snippet of code `{{ Context.Environment }}` inside an email inside double curly braces. HubSpot thinks it's an invalid merge field, and won't let me send it. Before when I ran into this issue, I could get around it by breaking up each character and wrapping them inside `<code></code>` but it's not working this time. Does anyone know of a workaround?

Like in the past, this would work, but it's not working now:
```<code>{</code><code>{</code><code>Context</code><code>.</code><code>Environment</code><code>}</code><code>}</code>```
